__e: It's a tough world, isn't it?
That was kind of heartless, wasn't it?

It was the meanest thing I ever heard of.
that's a nasty thing to say
That's the cruelest thing I've ever...

That's the cruellest thing I've ever heard of. I don't know what your father will say.

I mean, this is cruel and unusual punishment.
He hasn't seen the world outside which is cruel and wicked.

God, look, I know I'm being cruel, and I know I will have to pay for it when I get back, and I don't mind paying for it then, but just... just do me a favour, God, and don't make me pay for ir during the 2 weeks.

I know ... I seem not to have heart, is not it? But it is my belief.
